page.title: 15LIFE STYLES, BILLINGSHURST
page.content: THERE ARE TWO UNISEX HAIRDRESSERS,TWO LADIES FASHION SHOPS AND ONE SHOP SELLING FASHIONABLE GARMENTS FOR TOTS TO TEENS.WE HAVE A WELL STOCKED SPORTS SHOP AND CYCLE SHOP.RESTAURANTS INCLUDE INDIAN, CHINESE,AND FISH AND CHIPS ALL WITH TAKE-AWAY SERVICE.THE KINGS HEAD,HIGH STREET AND THE FIVE OAKS PUBLIC HOUSES SERVE MEALS.MEALS ARE SERVED ALL DAY AT THE LITTLE CHEF, STANE STREET.NO HOTELS,BUT BED AND BREAKFAST ACCOMMODATION IS AVAILABLE. LOCAL STUDIO POTTERY HOLDS EXHIBITIONS OF SUSSEX ARTISTS AND CRAFTSMEN.THERE IS A TEA SHOP ATTACHED.OCCASIONAL ANTIQUES FAIRS HELD AT INGFIELD MANOR SCHOOL.DISCOS AND JUMBLE SALES ARE HELD AT THE VILLAGE HALL IN AID OF CHARITIES.
